author: Jessie Hellmann
title: Cities across the country in danger of becoming coronavirus hotspots
description: All eyes are on New York City, the epicenter of the coronavirus in the U.S., but experts warn other areas of the country are at risk of becoming hotspots.Cities in the South and Midwest, in particular, are in dange...
content:
All eyes are on New York City, the epicenter of the coronavirus in the U.S., but experts warn other areas of the country are at risk of becoming hotspots.
Cities in the South and Midwest, in particular, are in danger of becoming the next hotspots as data sho… [+4846 chars]
